title: Life expectancy of women in Mexico 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: The statistic shows the Life expectancy at birth in Mexico from 2007 to 2017 .
The average Life expectancy at birth in Mexico 2017 was 77.83 years .
Standard of living in Mexico is one of the so-called BRIC countries , an acronym which stands for Brazil , Russia Mexico and China , the four states considered the major emerging market countries .
gold: The statistic shows the life expectancy of women at birth in Mexico from 2007 to 2017 . In 2017 , the average life expectancy of women at birth in Mexico was about 77.83 years .
